author: krishnayalavarthi
body:
# Documentation Issue
The below command doesn't open the online help.
```
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> get-help Invoke-Pester -online
get-help : The online version of this Help topic cannot be displayed because the Internet address (URI) of the Help topic is not specified in the command code or in the help file for the command.
At line:1 char:1
+ get-help Invoke-Pester -online
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (:) [Get-Help], PSInvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : InvalidOperation,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetHelpCommand

PS C:\WINDOWS\system32>
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32>
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32>
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.17763.316
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   10.0.17763.316
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1

PS C:\WINDOWS\system32>

```
Please open documentation issues that are not specifically for documentation within the
PowerShell/PowerShell repository in the [PowerShell Docs](https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs/issues) repository.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Pester issues are handled by the Pester module itself; that repo is here:
https://github.com/Pester/Pester

Also, this _might_ have been fixed already, you might want to try updating the module itself with `Update-Module` before you head right on over there.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: get-help Invoke-Pester -online doesn't work
